item.description:
It's Lifeday, a holiday on Chewbacca'shome planet Kashyyk. Chewie and Han Solo are trying to get to planet where Chewie's family is waiting for him. But the Empire is out searching for the rebels, giving everyone a hard time. While we are waiting, we are given a look at everyday life of a wookie family.

This was actually broadcast on CBS in the winter of 1978. I've seen parts of this and if you want to be brought back to the time that never was, the late 1970's this it.


Admission is only $3.00

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Kino Kafe- The Star Wars Holiday Speciial
